title: XDM Activity
description: A form of a task or a business event which is alinged to a given activity type

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the activity, such as 'open email','click email' etc.

description.title: Description
description.description: Detailed description of the activity name.

type.title: Type of Activity
type.description: Describing the nature of activity, in the form of a 'task' or a 'business event'.

area.title: Area of activity
area.description: Optional alingned area of the activity type, such as 'Mail' if the name is 'click email' etc.

category.title: Activity type Category
category.description: Category of the activity type. 'Marketing email', futher categorisation of activity area

isDeleted.title: Deleted flag
isDeleted.description: A boolean flag to depict if the corresponding activity type has been soft deleted

isActive.title: Status of the activity type
isActive.description: A boolean flag to depict if the activity type can be used by the business system,or has been discontinued.
